About Our Organization

Leading Environmental Innovation Since 2008

Gehn Eco Services Inc. is a pioneering women-led social enterprise that has been at the forefront of environmental sustainability and waste management innovation for over 15 years. Our mission is to transform communities through sustainable environmental practices while creating meaningful livelihood opportunities.

Our Mission

To promote environmental health and sanitation excellence while creating innovative livelihood opportunities that empower communities and protect our planet for future generations.

Empowerment

Empowering women and communities through sustainable environmental practices

Sustainability

Committed to long-term environmental protection and resource conservation

Community

Building strong partnerships with local communities and stakeholders

Innovation

Developing cutting-edge solutions for environmental challenges

Our Services

Comprehensive Environmental Solutions

We offer a complete range of environmental services designed to address the unique challenges faced by communities, businesses, and organizations in their sustainability journey.

Waste Management

Comprehensive waste collection, sorting, and recycling solutions for communities and businesses.

  • Waste collection & transportation
  • Recycling programs
  • Composting solutions
  • Waste audit & assessment
Learn More

Environmental Consultancy

Expert environmental assessment, planning, and compliance services for sustainable development.

  • Environmental impact assessment
  • Sustainability planning
  • Compliance consulting
  • Green certification support
Learn More

Sanitation Solutions

Innovative sanitation and hygiene solutions for improved public health and environmental protection.

  • Sanitation infrastructure
  • Hygiene education programs
  • Water quality management
  • Public health initiatives
Learn More

Livelihood Programs

Creating sustainable income opportunities through environmental entrepreneurship and skill development.

  • Green entrepreneurship training
  • Skill development programs
  • Micro-enterprise support
  • Market access facilitation
Learn More

Training & Capacity Building

Comprehensive training programs to build environmental awareness and technical skills.

  • Environmental education
  • Technical skills training
  • Leadership development
  • Community mobilization
Learn More

Impact Assessment

Measuring and evaluating the social, economic, and environmental impact of our programs.

  • Social impact measurement
  • Environmental monitoring
  • Economic analysis
  • Stakeholder reporting
Learn More

Success Stories

Discover how our programs are transforming communities and creating sustainable environmental solutions across Nigeria.

Community Transformation in Lagos

Implemented comprehensive waste management system in underserved communities, creating 50+ jobs and improving sanitation for 2,000+ residents.

Testimonials

What Our Partners Say

Hear from communities, businesses, and organizations that have experienced the transformative impact of our environmental services and programs.

"Gehn Eco Services transformed our community's approach to waste management. Their women-led team brought innovative solutions that not only improved our environment but also created jobs for our residents."

Chief Adebayo Oke

Community Leader

Lagos Community Development Association

"Their environmental consultancy services are world-class. The team's expertise in sustainable development and community engagement has set new standards in the sector."

Dr. Fatima Aliyu

Environmental Officer

Federal Ministry of Environment

"Thanks to their livelihood programs, I started my own waste recycling business. The training and support I received empowered me to become financially independent while contributing to environmental protection."

Mrs. Grace Okonkwo

Micro-entrepreneur

Green Waste Solutions

"Working with Gehn Eco Services has been transformative for our company. Their environmental assessment and compliance consulting helped us achieve our sustainability goals while improving our bottom line."

Mr. David Chen

Sustainability Manager

EcoTech Industries

"Their environmental education programs have inspired our students to become environmental stewards. The hands-on training and practical knowledge they provide are invaluable for the next generation."

Hajia Amina Yusuf

School Principal

Green Future Academy

"Gehn Eco Services' impact assessment methodology is rigorous and comprehensive. Their reports provide clear insights that help us make informed decisions about our environmental initiatives."

Engr. Michael Thompson
